meaningMnemonic: <radical>Rice</radical> that is <radical>blue</radical> has a strong <kanji>spirit</kanji>. Our spirits are blue, so if you ever see rice (or other food, or even people) that's blue, you know that's their spirit radiating out!
readingMnemonic:
You want to see the <kanji>spirit</kanji> up close, so you take your <reading>sa</reading>ber (せい), throw the blue rice in the air, and slice it in half! The rice explodes and blue light fills everything!

Then it's gone.
